bibl.title: Codex Tischendorfianus 1, Rediscovered and Revisited.
bibl.note: Folios of the Codex Tischendorfianus 1 (= 0106 Gregory-Aland; LDAB 2972) recovered in the Moscow State University Library (originally kept at Leipzig as Cod. Gr. 7). - A version of this paper was delivered at the 27th International Congress of Papyrology in Warsaw, Poland, in 2013. - Introduction. - General Description. - Date and Style. - Scribal Practice. - Transcription. - Pp. 155-156: Appendix on Punctuation.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, Alexander Lifshits & Julia Lougovaya, Codex Tischendorfianus 1, Rediscovered and Revisited.

Folios of the Codex Tischendorfianus 1 (= 0106 Gregory-Aland; LDAB 2972) recovered in the Moscow State University Library (originally kept at Leipzig as Cod. Gr. 7). - A version of this paper was delivered at the 27th International Congress of Papyrology in Warsaw, Poland, in 2013. - Introduction. - General Description. - Date and Style. - Scribal Practice. - Transcription. - Pp. 155-156: Appendix on Punctuation.
